authdriver.name: remote
authdriver.label: Remote authentication
authdriver.description: Authentication is done remotely (useful in CMS system).

param.name: SLAVE_MODE
param.label: Authentication mode
param.description: If set, the remote end calls us to register upon login, else, we will be calling the remote end when login is required

param.name: LOGIN_URL
param.label: Login URL
param.description: When not in slave mode, AJXP calls the given URL as URL?name=XXX&pass=XXX&key=XXX. Else it redirect to the given URL

param.name: LOGOUT_URL
param.label: Logout URL
param.description: Redirect to the given URL on loggin out

param.name: SECRET
param.label: Secret key
param.description: This key must only be known by remote end
